TopicTitle: Lag spike when coming out of timewarp

Articles.Content:
When I come out of "normal" timewarp, I get this 5-20 second freeze.

I got lots of mods, KSPRC for instance.

Im using Linux KSP 0.25 64-bit.

I got ~30 fps most of the time.

Im launching KSP with "LD_PRELOAD="libpthread.so.0 libGL.so.1" __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS=1" from Steam.

Probably the addons, but what are they?

We really need your logs before we can help with this
